title: Energy Flow Pattern Analysis
description: Complete the energy flow pattern by identifying the visual sequence. Each row and column follows a rotating energy cycle.
hints: Each row follows the same energy flow sequence, but starts at a different point in the cycle.
Look at complete rows/columns to identify the repeating pattern: each position increases by 1.
The pattern creates diagonal shifts - row 0 starts with 0, row 1 starts with 1, etc.
